Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.example.activityscheduler.user.controller.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/users") public class UserController extends Object
REST controller for managing User entities. Provides HTTP endpoints for user operations.

    Description
    UserController(UserRepository repo)
    Constructs a UserController with the given repository.

    • UserController

      public UserController(UserRepository repo)
      Constructs a UserController with the given repository.
      Parameters:
      repo - the user repository

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      @GetMapping public List<User> getAll()
      Retrieves all users.
      Returns:
      a list of all users

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public Optional<User> getById(@PathVariable String id)
      Retrieves a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the user ID
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the user if found, empty otherwise

    • existsByEmail

      @GetMapping("/exists") public boolean existsByEmail(@RequestParam String email)
      Checks if a user exists with the given email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email to check
      Returns:
      true if a user exists with this email, false otherwise

    • register

      @PostMapping("/register") public User register(@RequestBody UserRegistrationRequest request)
      Allows a new user to be registered by providing an email address and display name.
      Parameters:
      request - the user registration request
      Returns:
      the created user
